message: Life O'Rileytini = 1 part pure Riley Sugarbush maple syrup mixed with 2-3 parts 12 year Macallen Scotch over ice (or just cold)

@danparsons if you're in the mood for something sweet and soothing. We make maple syrup as a hobby. Gotta do something with the stuff besides putting it on pancakes. https://convore.com/riley-sugarbush/
